By the King, a proclamation for prevention of disorders which may be committed by souldiers England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
1 broadside.
Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ..., London : 1672.
"Given at our court at Whitehall the fourth day of December, in the four and twentieth year of our reign." Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
